comment_body: This was awesome!!! Beginning to end I was truly on the edge of my seat. Brilliant story idea. Brilliantly written.

I love this story but… whyyyyy would you keep that damn thing?  If my roomba had killed two of my kittens I would have taken the thing outside and reduced it to a pile of dust.

Amazing storytelling, just wondering if the human really is that stupid.
Honestly,  loved the way this story built . Great read.

Truly insane stuff OP! The story reminded me of how the cat we had in my childhood was protective of her offsprings! Rooted for your protagonist's sweet revenge all the way through... My upvote & sincere thanks for this!
That was great. Original and able to capture the reader
I love animal stories and this one was great! Please do more!!!
can we please have more Mother Cat stories? how does she deal when her kittens are misbehaving????
Thank you 😊 for reading and commenting🌺

Thanks for reading and commenting🙂
Roombas are quite expensive. Plus the murder of the two kitties looked like an “accident”. I think Feets was too stupid to realize that it wasn’t.
Thank you for your kind words💐💐
Thank you for reading and I’m glad you enjoyed the story😄
Thank you and I’m glad you enjoyed it 🌺
Thank you! And I’m glad you enjoyed it and my story bright back sweet memories for you🌷
Thanks for reading and I’m glad you enjoyed it 🌷
